Name: Super Arcade Soccer
About the game: Classic Football is back with Super Arcade Soccer. Super Arcade Soccer is a fun soccer game with arcade playability; direct, accessible control; and a wide range of actions, such as passing, centering, skill shots… You can play in Cup mode and become the best in the world, but you can also play with your friends in multiplayer mode, either 1-on-1. - 3 Different gameplay cameras. - Direct, Arcade playability. - Easy to control, but hard to master. - 40 National teams to choose from. - World Cup mode. - 2-Player multiplayer mode.
